snippet: An investigation into offenses that may or may not have been committed decades ago has resulted in a flurry of arrests and has many people asking who will be next.
abstract: Operation Yewtree, broad British investigation into sexual offenses that may have occurred decades ago, has resulted in flurry of arrests of aging stars from bygone era; inquiry was formed following 2012 disclosure that entertainer Jimmy Savile had been serial sexual predator, which spurred hundreds of victims to come forward with their own accounts of sexual assault.
lead_paragraph: An investigation into offenses that may or may not have been committed decades ago has resulted in a flurry of arrests and has many people asking who will be next.

headline.seo: Older British Stars Caught Up in Operation Yewtree
headline.main: British Stars of Yesteryear Are Ensnared in Sexual Offenses Inquiry
headline.print_headline: British Stars of Yesteryear Find Themselves in Sights of Sexual Offenses Inquiry
